typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		name as string,
		date as string,
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 derive(date = toDate(date),
		type = toDecimal(type, 19, 4)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn2
